content.raw:
We have some robots with either
a very precise 'external' dynamic model
or
where dynamics do not matter (slowly moving industrial with light load) because they can be regarded as static position controlled.
In both cases we use custom model plugins to set the joint positions in each simulation step (with physics disabled).

The other use case is #!/osrf/gazebo/issue/1072/allow-to-set-initial-joint-pose-in-sdf, which I might implement myself.
content.html:
We have some robots with either a very precise 'external' dynamic model or where dynamics do not matter (slowly moving industrial with light load) because they can be regarded as static position controlled. In both cases we use custom model plugins to set the joint positions in each simulation step (with physics disabled).

The other use case is #!/osrf/gazebo/issue/1072/allow-to-set-initial-joint-pose-in-sdf, which I might implement myself.
